full.name: Voxtral Mini 3B (Full)
full.description: Full precision model - Best quality, requires ~20-30GB RAM during loading (CPU loading: 10-30 min)

memory_requirements.load_time_cpu: 10-30 minutes (use NVIDIA GPU for faster loading)

quantized.name: Voxtral Mini 3B (4-bit Quantized)
quantized.description: 4-bit quantized model - 75% less memory usage (NVIDIA GPU required, auto-falls back to full precision on Mac/CPU)

small-24b-full.name: Voxtral Small 24B (Full)
small-24b-full.description: Large 24B parameter model - Superior accuracy for complex audio, requires high-end hardware

small-24b-quantized.name: Voxtral Small 24B (4-bit Quantized)
small-24b-quantized.description: 4-bit quantized 24B model - Best accuracy with reduced memory (NVIDIA GPU required)

memory_requirements.load_time_cpu: N/A - NVIDIA GPU required for quantization
